attributes.action: Making remembrance poppy burning illegal by an act of law
attributes.additional_details: We demand that the act of burning remembrance poppies is made illegal under the law. We also demand that any group, organisation, club, institution or individuals involved in the burning of the remembrance poppy's are proscribed and banned as an organisation or group by law. Any person or organisation found guilty of burning remembrance poppies will be punished with a mandatory term of imprisonment under section 5 of the public act.
